name: Fire In Engineering - Escape Room - Ryan Laley Games Jam 2020
name_original: Fire In Engineering - Escape Room - Ryan Laley Games Jam 2020
description:
Fire In Engineering, by BossMan Studios

Ryan Laley Games Jam 2020 - Submission

You've woken up to your ship on fire! Find a way to unlock the door to the bridge so you can turn on the fire suppression systems!

E to interact

CRTL + ALT + DEL to exit, sorry guys. I didn't get enough time to implement a proper menu and UI system, or exit button :(

I will continue to work on this project though.
